H0.text: Who was Europe's captain in the 2008 Ryder Cup. Colin Montgomerie

H1.text: Who was Europe's captain in the 2008 Ryder Cup. Ian Woosnam

H2.text: Who was Europe's captain in the 2008 Ryder Cup. Bernhard Langer

H3.text: Who was Europe's captain in the 2008 Ryder Cup. Nick Faldo

A4.text: The team captains were Paul Azinger for the US and Nick Faldo for Europe.
